summary.span: 提供 对象的强类型化集合，并实现 接口以支持在该集合中进行导航。

span.span: Provides a strongly typed collection for objects and implements the interface to support navigating through the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供对象的强类型集合 。The class provides a strongly typed collection for objects. 它 在从零开始的数组中存储对象。It stores objects internally in a zero-based array. 首次创建集合时，你可以修改它，然后使用以下方法添加、复制和删除 对象：You can modify a collection when it is first created, and then use the following methods to add, copy, and remove objects: - 若要添加 对象，请使用 、 和 方法。To add objects, use the , , and methods. - 若要复制 对象，请使用 方法。To copy objects, use the method. - 若要删除 对象，请使用 方法。To remove objects, use the method. 您可以 使用静态方法创建不允许添加、复制和删除对象的只读 。You can create a read-only , which does not permit adding, copying, nor removing objects, by using the static method. 和方法返回的集合 是只读的，因为在 从提供程序返回的对象上访问该属性时返回。The collections that are returned by the and methods are read-only, as is the that is returned when the property is accessed on a object that is returned from a provider. 如果尝试 通过设置默认索引器属性或使用以下任一方法修改只读，则会引发异常：A exception is thrown, if you attempt to modify a read-only by setting the default indexer property or by using any of the following methods: - - - - - - 在 调用上述列表中的任何方法之前，请使用属性来检查集合。Use the property to check the collection before calling any of the methods in the preceding list. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建 集合，然后 使用方法将对象添加到其中 。The following code example demonstrates how to create a collection, and then add objects to it using the method. 是当前站点地图的子集，只显示前两个层次结构级别。The is a subset of the current site map, showing only the first two hierarchical levels. [!code-csharp[System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection_2#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection_2/CS/webform2smccs.aspx#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection_2#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection_2/VB/webform2smcvb.aspx#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不能将 对象添加到只读或固定大小的 集合。You cannot add a object to a read-only or fixed-size collection. 可以 通过检查属性来测试是否为只读 。You can test whether a is read-only by checking the property. ## Examples 本部分包含两个代码示例。This section contains two code examples. 第一个代码示例演示如何创建新 集合并向其中添加元素。The first code example demonstrates how to create a new collection and add elements to it. 第二个代码示例演示如何将元素添加到自定义站点地图提供程序。The second code example demonstrates how to add elements to a custom site map provider. 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 构造函数创建新的 ，然后使用方法将元素添加到其中 。The following code example demonstrates how to use the constructor to create a new , and then add elements to it with the method. [!code-csharp[System.Web.SiteMapNode_2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SiteMapNode_2/CS/sitemapnode2acs.aspx.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.SiteMapNode_2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SiteMapNode_2/VB/sitemapnode2avb.aspx.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例演示了一个自定义站点地图提供程序实现，并演示了如何使用 构造函数创建新 的，并使用方法向添加了元素 。The following code example demonstrates a custom site map provider implementation and shows how to use the constructor to create a new and add elements to the with the method. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大代码示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger code example provided for the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用 索引器来循环访问集合的内容 或替换 指定索引处的对象。You can use the indexer to iterate over the contents of a collection or to replace the object at a specified index. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 索引器 从集合中检索对象 。The following code example demonstrates how to use the indexer to retrieve a object from the collection. 在此示例中， 使用方法将对象从内部数组的第二个元素中移除， 并使用方法追加到数组 。In this example, a object is removed from its position at the second element of the internal array using the method and is appended to the array with the method. 若要 在特定索引处插入对象，而不是将其追加到数组末尾，请使用 方法。To insert a object at a specific index, instead of appending it to the end of the array, use the method. remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以 通过检查属性来测试集合是否为只读 。You can test whether a collection is read-only by checking the property. `true` 当为只读时，属性也返回 。The property also returns `true` when a is read-only. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性来测试 集合是只读的还是可修改的。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to test whether a collection is read-only or modifiable. 如果 `siteNodes` 可修改，则 `MoveNode` 对它调用; 否则，将 使用作为基来创建克隆 `siteNodes` 。If `siteNodes` is modifiable, `MoveNode` is called on it; otherwise, a clone is created, using `siteNodes` as a base. [!code-csharp[System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection_1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection_1/CS/webform1smccs.aspx#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection_1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection_1/VB/webform1smcvb.aspx#1)]

span.span: is .

span.span: A read-only collection supports read and search operations, but does not support the , , , , , and methods, nor the setter on the default indexer property, .

summary.span: 获取可用于同步对集合的访问的对象。

span.span: Gets an object that can be used to synchronize access to the collection.

value.span: 用于同步对 的访问的对象。

span.span: An object that can be used to synchronize access to the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 枚举 集合本质上不是线程安全的过程。Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread safe procedure. 即使在 同步时，其他线程仍可以修改 ，这会导致枚举器引发异常。Even when a is synchronized, other threads can still modify the , which causes the enumerator to throw an exception. 若要保证枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以 在整个枚举期间锁定，也可以捕获由其他线程进行的更改所导致的异常。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes that are made by other threads.
